typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	recursiveInputPath as string ('translated/csv/site/USR/FDC/Tools/ASH10653/2020-008-01'),
	recursiveOutputPath as string ('translated/parquet/site/USR/FDC/Tools/ASH10653/2020-008-01')
}
source(output(
		{_c0} as short,
		Filename_Translated as string,
		Filename_Original as string,
		FabGuard_Version as string,
		Run_Path_and_Name as string,
		Recipe_Path_and_Name as string,
		SensorID as string,
		Version as string,
		Acquired_with_Version as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Group as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_ID as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Description as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Area as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Tool_Type as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_FabGuard as short,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_ID as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_Description as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_Chamber_Type as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_1_TDS_Type as string,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_1_TDS_Serial_Number as integer,
		Equipment_Information_Tool_Chamber_and_Sensor_1_TDS_Version as string,
		Substrate_Information_Lot_ID21 as string,
		Substrate_Information_Cassette_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Slot_ID as short,
		Substrate_Information_Substrate_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Part_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Layer_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Technology_ID as string,
		Substrate_Information_Lot_ID28 as timestamp,
		Substrate_Information_Substrate_Start_Time_GMT as timestamp,
		Process_Information_Operator_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Sequence_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Recipe_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Control_Job_ID as string,
		Process_Information_Process_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_1_ID35 as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_1_ID36 as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_2_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_3_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_4_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_5_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_6_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_7_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_8_ID as string,
		General_Info_Start_Time as string,
		General_Info_Start_Time_at_the_acquisition_location as timestamp,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_Path_and_Name as string,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_Revision as short,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_last_modified_by as string,
		General_Info_FabGuards_Recipe_last_modified_Time_local as timestamp,
		General_Info_Start_Time_at_the_acquisition_GMT as timestamp,
		General_Info_Run_Path_and_Name as string,
		General_Info_Duration_s as double,
		General_Info_Number_of_Data_Points as short,
		General_Info_Number_of_Scans as boolean,
		General_Info_Number_of_Bins as short,
		Bins as short,
		TimePoints as short,
		{Time Relative (sec)} as double,
		{Time Absolute (UTC)} as double,
		{Time Absolute (Date_Time)} as string,
		Step as boolean,
		Status as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_CF4_Flow_(sccm);_SVID180} as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_O2_Large_Flow_(sccm);_SVID181} as short,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_NF3_Flow_(sccm);_SVID182} as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_N2H2_Flow_(sccm);_SVID183} as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_Argon_Flow_(sccm);_SVID184} as short,
		{Tool:_Pres-_Chamber_Pressure_(torr);_SVID186} as double,
		{Tool:_Temp_-_Hot_Plate_(C);_SVID187} as short,
		{Tool:_EP_-_Photo_Multiplier_Vout_(v);_SVID188} as double,
		{Tool:_RF_Bias;_SVID189} as short,
		{Tool:_RF_Match_C1_Pos_(%);_SVID190} as short,
		{Tool:_RF_Match_C2_Pos_(%);_SVID191} as short,
		{Tool:_RF_Forward_Power_(Watts);_SVID192} as short,
		{Tool:_RF_Reflected_Power_(Watts);_SVID193} as short,
		{Tool:_MW_Forward_Power_(Watts);_SVID194} as short,
		{Tool:_MW_Reflected_Power_(Watts);_SVID195} as short,
		{Tool:_Recipe_Step_Number;_SVID196_[Tool's_Step]} as short,
		{Tool:_Wafer_-_Slot_Number;_SVID222} as short,
		{Tool:_EP_-_End_Point_Time;_SVID266} as boolean,
		{Tool:_RF_Power_Set_Point_(Watts);_SVID288} as short,
		{Tool:_MW_Set_Point_(Watts);_SVID289} as short,
		{Tool:_Pres-_Chamber_Pressure_Set_Point_(torr);_SVID290} as double,
		{Tool:_Temp_-_Hot_Plate_SetPoint_(C);_SVID291} as short,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_CF4_Set_Point_(sccm);_SVID292} as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_O2_Large_Set_Point_(sccm);_SVID293} as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_NF3_Set_Point_(sccm);_SVID294} as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_N2H2_Set_Point_(sccm);_SVID295} as boolean,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_Argon_Set_Point_(sccm);_SVID296} as boolean,
		{Tool:_EP_-_Photo_Multiplier_End_Point_HiV_(v);_SVID316} as short,
		{Tool:_Pin_Height_Set_Point;_SVID317} as short,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_O2_Small_Flow} as double,
		{Tool:_Gas_-_O2_Small_Set_Point} as double,
		Tool_Bin_Polling_Latency as double,
		Tool_Bin_Data_Age as double,
		Tool_Bin_Data_Age_SECS as double,
		{Sig:_Temp_-_Hot_Plate_-_Filtered_(No_RF)_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Filter:_Acceptable_Data_Age} as boolean,
		{Sig:_Ash_Total_Time} as double,
		{Sig:_Overash_Time} as double,
		{Sig:_Ash_EP_Time} as double,
		{Sig:_Overash_Percentage} as double,
		{Sig:_Filter:_Max_Data_Age} as boolean,
		{Sig:_Overash_Percentage_filtered_for_Data_Age} as double,
		{Sig:_MW_-_Power_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_RF_-_Power_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas_-_Large_O2_Flow_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas_-_Small_O2_Flow_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas_-_CF4_Flow_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas_-_NF3_Flow_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas_-_Argon_Flow_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas_-_N2H2_Flow_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_MW_-_Reflected_Power_(Steady_state)_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_RF_-_Reflected_Power_(Steady_state)_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Pres_-_Pressure_Deviation_(High_Pressure)(Steady_State)_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_EP_-_EP_Intensity_after_resist_removal_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Temp_-_Hot_Plate_Deviation_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_EP_-_EP_Max_Intensity_with_no_RF} as double,
		{Sig:_Pres_-_Pressure_Deviation_(Low_Pressure)(Steady_State)_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Filter:_Slot_Number_Correction_>_25} as short,
		{Sig:_Filter:_Slot_Number_Corrected_Value} as short,
		{Sig:_RF_-_Bias_(Power_on)_(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Overash_Time_7V} as double,
		{Sig:_Overash_Percentage_7V} as double,
		{Sig:_Overash_Percentage_filtered_for_Data_Age_7V} as double,
		{Sig:_EP_-_End_Point_voltage_above_trigger._(post_Run)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas:_O2_Large_Usage_(liters)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas:_O2_Small_Usage_(liters)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas:_NF3_Usage_(liters)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas:_CF4_Usage_(liters)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas:_N2H2_Usage_(liters)} as double,
		{Sig:_Gas:_Argon_Usage_(liters)} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:[(concat($recursiveInputPath, '/*.csv'))]) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace($$,';',''),':',''),':',''),'(',''),')',''),' ',''),' ',''),')',''),'(',''),']',''),'[',''),'(',''),')',''),'>',''),'\'','') = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		fdc_metadata_key as string,
		fdc_metadata_value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	skipLines: 3) ~> FDCMetaData
Filter1 pivot(groupBy(fdc_metadata_value),
	pivotBy(fdc_metadata_key),
	{} = first(fdc_metadata_value),
	columnNaming: '$V$N',
	lateral: false) ~> Pivot1
FDCMetaData filter(instr("General Info, Run Path and Name" , fdc_metadata_key)>0 || 
instr("Sensor ID" , fdc_metadata_key)>0 ||
instr("Substrate Information, Lot ID" , fdc_metadata_key)>0 ||
instr("Substrate Information, Slot ID" , fdc_metadata_key)>0) ~> Filter1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

		{_c0} as short,

		Run_Path_and_Name as string,

		Extra_Information_Extra_6_ID as string,
		Extra_Information_Extra_7_ID as string,

		General_Info_Start_Time as string,
		General_Info_Start_Time_at_the_acquisition_location as timestamp,

		{Tool:_RF_Forward_Power_(Watts);_SVID192} as short,

		{Tool:_RF_Power_Set_Point_(Watts);_SVID288} as short,

source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			translate($$,':; ()[]','') = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	skipLines: 63,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy','MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'long',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> FDCDataFile
FDCDataFile derive({Time Relative (sec)} = toString(byName('Time Relative (sec)')),
		{Time Absolute (UTC)} = toString(byName('Time Absolute (UTC)')),
		{Time Absolute (Date_Time)} = toString(byName('Time Absolute (Date_Time)')),
		Step = toString(byName('Step')),
		Status = toString(byName('Status')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chamber_2_rpm_(r/min);_SVID200} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chamber_2_rpm_(r/min);_SVID200')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_rx_time_rem_(cs);_SVID201} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_rx_time_rem_(cs);_SVID201')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_step_time_rem_(cs);_SVID202} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_step_time_rem_(cs);_SVID202')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_wafers_present;_SVID205} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_wafers_present;_SVID205')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_door_state;_SVID206} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_door_state;_SVID206')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_processed_state;_SVID208} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_processed_state;_SVID208')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_PP_Step;_SVID211_[Tool's_Step]} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_PP_Step;_SVID211_[Tools_Step]')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_PP_Exec_Name;_SVID212} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_PP_Exec_Name;_SVID212')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_Process_State;_SVID213} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_Process_State;_SVID213')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_N2_Temperature_(degC);_SVID214} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_N2_Temperature_(degC);_SVID214')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_left_vision_score;_SVID215} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_left_vision_score;_SVID215')),
		{Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_right_vision_score;_SVID216} = toString(byName('Tool:_SST1_chmbr_2_right_vision_score;_SVID216')),
		{Snapshot:_SST1_chmbr_2_left_vision_score;_SVID215} = toString(byName('Snapshot:_SST1_chmbr_2_left_vision_score;_SVID215')),
		{Snapshot:_SST1_chmbr_2_right_vision_score;_SVID216} = toString(byName('Snapshot:_SST1_chmbr_2_right_vision_score;_SVID216')),
		Tool_Bin_Polling_Latency = toString(byName('Tool_Bin_Polling_Latency')),
		Tool_Bin_Data_Age = toString(byName('Tool_Bin_Data_Age')),
		Tool_Bin_Data_Age_SECS = toString(byName('Tool_Bin_Data_Age_SECS'))) ~> MapDrifted1
MapDrifted1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['prash_example.parquet'],
	mapColumn(
		time_relative_sec = {Time Relative (sec)},
		time_absolute_utc = {Time Absolute (UTC)},
		time_absolute_dt = {Time Absolute (Date_Time)}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FDCtoParquet

source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> sink1

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['sandbox/user/zbmhpw/source/*test1.csv']) ~> YieldSource
YieldSource select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			regexReplace($$," ","_") = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExtraction
SelectExtraction sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> YieldSink

source(output(
		{_c0} as short,
		Filename_Translated as string,
		Filename_Original as string,
		FabGuard_Version as string,
		Run_Path_and_Name as string,
		Recipe_Path_and_Name as string,

source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'adls',

	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			replace(replace(replace($$,'\'',''),'[',''),']','') = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

		{Sig_Gas_Ar_DevAvg_Steady_State_5-60_RF_On_post_Run} as double,
		Sig_VPP_TRIM_Step_4_post_Run as double,
		Sig_C4F8_TRIM_Step_4_post_Run as double,
		Sig_VPP_TRIM_Step_2_post_Run as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,'=','') = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	compressionType: 'snappy',
	compressionLevel: 'Fastest',
	fileSystem: 'adls',
	folderPath: 'translated/examples/ETH.delta.df',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	mapColumn(
		each(match(true()),
			replace($$,'=','') = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		LotId as string,
		Fab as string,
		Family as string,
		Technology as string,
		Plan as string,
		Device as string,
		SourceLot as string,
		LotClass as string,
		wf_num as short,
		wf_id as string,
		Sequence as string,
		ProcStep as string,
		Stage as string,
		orig_slot as short,
		final_slot as short,
		orig_cass as short,
		final_cass as short,
		zone as string,
		zone_seat as string,
		boat_seat as string,
		subtool as string,
		equipment as string,
		trackInTime as string,
		trackOutTime as string,
		recipe as string,
		Operator as string,
		Tooling as string,
		ReworkCount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	skipLines: 1,
	wildcardPaths:['inbound/site/USR/WEH/*.gz']) ~> source2
source2 derive(trackInTime_formated = toTimestamp(trackInTime, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss'),
		trackOutTime_formated = toTimestamp(trackOutTime, 'yyyyMMddHHmmss')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'adls',
	folderPath: 'translated/delta/site/USR/WEH',
	truncate: false,
	mergeSchema: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4

properties.description: Scan the file path on your source storage store and get the container list.

activities.name: ForEachContainer
activities.description: Get the container list from Metadata activity and then iterates each of them to Copy activity.

activities.name: CopyOneContainer
activities.description: Copy each container from source storage store to destination store.
